snippet: Top seed Serena Williams dropped the second set before bouncing back to beat compatriot Christina McHale 6-3 5-7 6-2 in second-round action at the Miami Open in Florida on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Top seed Serena Williams dropped the second set before bouncing back to beat compatriot Christina McHale 6-3 5-7 6-2 in second-round action at the Miami Open in Florida on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Edges McHale in Three, Halep Wins
headline.main: Serena Williams Edges McHale in Three, Halep Wins
